top_comments_top.body: It’s got a huge crack on it! You should return it.
It looks worth more than that! Good deal!
Did GameStop finally change their ridiculous pricing and allow customers to occasionally get a deal?!?
Kinda looks like the giant thwomp in Super Mario 64.

Nice grab, dude!
Get used to the sound effects of the disc drive on this one!
I have the same Xbox One X, and EVERYTIME I eject a disc (which I think because of this, is hardly ever now) I'm convinced it's scratching my discs to shit lol.
